plants.wateringCycle: Every 2-6 weeks, depending on humidity and light conditions
plants.description: A hardy and stylish indoor plant with tall, upright leaves. Thrives in low light and is drought-tolerant.
A resilient and popular indoor plant with arching leaves. Requires minimal care and purifies the air.
A versatile trailing plant with heart-shaped leaves. Well-suited for both beginners and experienced plant lovers.
Variety of colorful foliage. Adapts well to indoor environments.

plants.lightRequirements: Full sun (at least 6 hours of direct sunlight per day)
plants.description: Pruning and deadheading encourage blooming. Different rose types offer a range of colors and fragrances.

plants.lightRequirements: Full sun for optimal growth and fragrance
plants.description: Drought-tolerant once established. Prune after flowering to maintain shape and encourage new growth.

plants.lightRequirements: Shade to partial shade, protecting from direct sunlight
plants.description: Ideal for shaded gardens. Boston Fern and Maidenhair Fern are popular choices.
Colorful bracts create a stunning display. Prune after flowering for shape.

plants.harvestingInfo: Pinch leaves regularly to encourage bushier growth and prevent flowering.
plants.description: A fragrant herb with tender leaves used in various cuisines. Excellent for pesto, salads, and garnishes.

plants.harvestingInfo: Harvest when tomatoes are fully colored and firm.
plants.description: Compact and prolific tomato plant producing sweet cherry-sized fruits. Ideal for small gardens and containers.

plants.harvestingInfo: Pinch off leaves to encourage bushy growth and prevent flowering.
plants.description: A refreshing herb with a pleasant aroma. Used in teas, cocktails, and culinary dishes.

plants.harvestingInfo: Pick ripe strawberries as they turn fully red.
plants.description: Delicious and nutritious berries grown in home gardens. Perfect for snacking, desserts, and preserves.

plants.lightRequirements: Indirect light, but can tolerate low light conditions.
plants.maintenanceInfo: Produces 'pups' on arching stems that can be repotted.
plants.benefits: Air-purifying qualities and ease of care.
plants.description: A resilient and popular indoor plant with arching leaves. Requires minimal care and purifies the air.

plants.lightRequirements: Low to medium indirect light. Can tolerate low light
plants.wateringCycle: Every 1-2 weeks. Wilting leaves indicate the need for water
plants.maintenanceInfo: Keep the leaves clean by wiping them with a damp cloth.
plants.benefits: Air-purifying qualities and elegant white blooms.
plants.description: A popular indoor plant known for its air-purifying abilities and elegant white flowers.

plants.wateringCycle: Every 2-4 weeks, depending on the season
plants.maintenanceInfo: Allow the soil to dry out between waterings.
plants.benefits: Symbolizes prosperity and luck in some cultures.
plants.description: A succulent with thick, fleshy leaves that store water. Symbolizes prosperity and luck in some cultures.

plants.maintenanceInfo: Harvest zucchini when they're young and tender for best flavor.
plants.description: A fast-growing summer squash producing edible, tender fruits. Suitable for garden beds or containers.
